title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 2.12 - Reporting by others than physicians of cases of diseases presumably communicable
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 2.12 - Reporting by others than physicians of cases of diseases presumably communicable

State Regulations

When no physician is in attendance, it shall be the duty of the head of a private household or the person in charge of any institution, school, hotel, boarding house, camp or vessel or any public health nurse or any other person having knowledge of an individual affected with any disease presumably communicable, to report immediately the name and address of such person to the city, county or district health officer. Notes
